page.title: 20A newcomer's impressions
page.content: Where we used to live there were lots of trees, here there are none. We lived between Bath and Chippenham.The school I went to was Corsham School with 1000 pupils, but the school here has only 45. There, each lesson was an hour but here only 45 minutes.Here we do History not Humanities.There the buildings were bigger and so were the games pitches.Unst is very different - bigger than I thought with not many houses and quite a few ruins. I don't like the weather because it is cool and windy. The nights are very light in June - it hardly gets dark at all. {This block written by Secondary 1 at {Baltasound School:Andrina,Anton,Arthur {Billy,Francis,Gail,Hazel,Ingrid,Janice {Jonathan,Leon,Louise,Matthew,Patrick, {Peter,Rachel,Robert,Stuart,Tracy,and {Wilma. {
